title: Genetics10
subtitle: The Interactive and Ready-to-Use Biology Tool for Students and Teachers

overview.title: About Genetics10
overview.paragraph1: Gen10 is a Python package designed for students to explore genetics and biology concepts. This package provides useful functions ready-to-use for students to focus on the learning.
overview.paragraph2: It requires any software or app installation, making it accessible and classroom-friendly, perfect for school managed devices.
overview.paragraph3: In short, Gen10 provides the genomics functions you need right at your fingertips.

features.title: Key Features
features.dna_desc: Convert between DNA and RNA with amino acid sequencing
features.mutations_desc: Simulate random or specific site mutations
features.compare_desc: Compare DNA sequences and find complementaries
features.gc_desc: Calculate GC content and melting temperatures

students.title: For Students
students.desc: New to Python? Start with our comprehensive Beginner's Guide designed specifically for students.

teachers.title: For Educators
teachers.desc: Perfect classroom tool for interactive genetics education with curriculum-aligned resources.
